findings.title: MINTER_ROLE should not be used for burning tokens
findings.description: The MINTER role is allowed to burn tokens which are not correct as per the naming conventions. The MINTER role should only be used to mint new tokens and a BURNER role should be used for the burning of tokens.

findings.title: Inconsistent Parameter Naming
findings.description: The '_to' parameter in the burn() function should be renamed as '_from' to accurately reflect its purpose.

findings.title: Incorrect revert reason in burn() function
findings.description: The burn() function contains a require statement to check the role of the caller but does not provide a revert reason.

findings.title: Arithmetic addition should be done before subtraction
findings.description: In the claim() function of SporeStake and LiquidityFarming contracts, the _pending amount is calculated incorrectly as it subtracts before adding.

findings.title: 100% Line and Branch Coverage for Unit Test Cases is Recommended
findings.description: It is recommended to have 100% line and branch coverage for unit test cases to ensure thorough testing of the smart contract.
